general.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

authentication.googleAuthUnavailable: Google authentication is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
authentication.accessDenied: You do not have permission to log in.
authentication.configurationError: There is a problem with the authentication configuration.
authentication.oauthCallbackError: There was a problem with the OAuth provider.
authentication.emailRegisteredWithEmailLogin: This email {emailText}is registered with email sign-in. Please continue with email or use a different account.
authentication.emailRegisteredWithSocialLogin: This email is already registered with {provider} sign-in. Please use {provider} to log in or use a different email.

validationErrors.emailValidationError: Please enter a valid email address.
validationErrors.verificationCodeEmptyError: Please enter a valid verification code.
validationErrors.verificationCodeValidationError: Sorry, we couldn't verify this code. Please try again or request a new one.

magicLink.requestMagicLinkSuccess: Your sign-in link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox and click on the link to log in. If it doesnâ€™t show up, check your spam folder or try sending it again.
magicLink.requestMagicLinkError: Sorry, we're having trouble sending the verification link now. Please try again later.
magicLink.failedToSendMagicLinkError: Failed to send magic link. Please try again.
magicLink.verifyMagicLinkError: The verification link is either invalid or has expired. Please try signing in with your email again to request a new link.
magicLink.failedToVerifyCodeError: Failed to verify code. Please try again.
magicLink.verificationCodeSent: We have sent a verification code to your email. You can either enter the code below or click in the email.
